title: Binary Search
description: Binary search efficiently finds the position of a target value within a sorted array by repeatedly dividing the search interval in half.
keyPoints: Can be adapted for lower/upper bound, first/last occurrence, etc.
pseudocode:
1. Set left and right pointers.
2. While left <= right, check the middle element.
3. If target found, return index.
4. If target < mid, search left half; else, search right half.
